Constructor Detail

BluetoothSerialConnection

public BluetoothSerialConnection(BlueCoveManager blue,
                                 java.lang.String deviceAddress)
Default Constructor.

Using this constructor will require that at least the port be set later on. The baudrate will default to 115200bps.

Parameters:
blue -
